Class DatabaseConfigurationFactory

java.lang.Object
dimstyl.orm.configuration.DatabaseConfigurationFactory
public final class DatabaseConfigurationFactory extends Object
A factory class for obtaining database configuration instances.

This factory provides a method to retrieve a DatabaseConfiguration implementation based on the specified DatabaseEngine. It ensures that the same configuration instance is used consistently.

  • Method Details

    • getConfiguration

      public static DatabaseConfiguration getConfiguration(DatabaseEngine databaseEngine)
      Retrieves a database configuration instance for the specified database engine.

      This method sets the database engine for the shared GenericDatabaseConfiguration instance and returns it for use.

      Parameters:
      databaseEngine - The DatabaseEngine to configure.
      Returns:
      A DatabaseConfiguration instance configured for the specified engine.
